text:
Penny (https://www.pennyapp.io) | San Francisco | ONSITE - Hiring for a well-rounded engineer to join our three-person team working in the personal finance space. - You can expect to touch every aspect of the business and get serious equity. - Stack: React frontend, Ruby backend, iOS/Android apps, some ML, etc. - More details: https://www.pennyapp.io/jobs

I'm one of the two co-founders. Feel free to email me directly if you're interested: mitch ~at~ pennyapp.io.
